splits.name: load_and_store_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Load and Store Group' (section title for LDA, LDX, LDY, STA, STX, STY). References the load/store instruction chunks below.

splits.name: lda_instruction
splits.description: LDA (Load Accumulator). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute LDA $aaaa ($AD, 3 bytes) sets N,Z; Zero Page LDA $aa ($A5, 2) ; Immediate LDA #$aa ($A9, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X LDA $aaaa,X ($BD, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y LDA $aaaa,Y ($B9, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X LDA $aa,X ($B5, 2) ; Indexed Indirect LDA ($aa,X) ($A1, 2) ; Indirect Indexed LDA ($aa),Y ($B1, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: ldx_instruction
splits.description: LDX (Load X Register). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute LDX $aaaa ($AE, 3 bytes) sets N,Z; Zero Page LDX $aa ($A6, 2) ; Immediate LDX #$aa ($A2, 2) ; Absolute Indexed Y LDX $aaaa,Y ($BE, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed Y LDX $aa,Y ($B6, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: ldy_instruction
splits.description: LDY (Load Y Register). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute LDY $aaaa ($AC, 3 bytes) sets N,Z; Zero Page LDY $aa ($A4, 2) ; Immediate LDY #$aa ($A0, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X LDY $aaaa,X ($BC, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X LDY $aa,X ($B4, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: sta_instruction
splits.description: STA (Store Accumulator). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute STA $aaaa ($8D, 3 bytes) (no flags affected) ; Zero Page STA $aa ($85, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X STA $aaaa,X ($9D, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y STA $aaaa,Y ($99, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X STA $aa,X ($95, 2) ; Indexed Indirect STA ($aa,X) ($81, 2) ; Indirect Indexed STA ($aa),Y ($91, 2).

splits.name: stx_instruction
splits.description: STX (Store X Register). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute STX $aaaa ($8E, 3 bytes) (no flags affected) ; Zero Page STX $aa ($86, 2) ; Zero Page Indexed Y STX $aa,Y ($96, 2).

splits.name: sty_instruction
splits.description: STY (Store Y Register). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute STY $aaaa ($8C, 3 bytes) (no flags affected) ; Zero Page STY $aa ($84, 2) ; Zero Page Indexed X STY $aa,X ($94, 2).

splits.name: arithmetic_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Arithmetic Group' (section title for ADC and SBC).
splits.reason: audit: Contains only a categorical header/metadata linking ADC and SBC; no technical or standalone instruction details.

splits.name: adc_instruction
splits.description: ADC (Add with Carry). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute ADC $aaaa ($6D, 3 bytes) affects N,V,Z,C ; Zero Page ADC $aa ($65, 2) ; Immediate ADC #$aa ($69, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X ADC $aaaa,X ($7D, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y ADC $aaaa,Y ($79, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X ADC $aa,X ($75, 2) ; Indexed Indirect ADC ($aa,X) ($61, 2) ; Indirect Indexed ADC ($aa),Y ($71, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Overflow, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: sbc_instruction
splits.description: SBC (Subtract with Carry). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute SBC $aaaa ($ED, 3 bytes) affects N,V,Z,C ; Zero Page SBC $aa ($E5, 2) ; Immediate SBC #$aa ($E9, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X SBC $aaaa,X ($FD, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y SBC $aaaa,Y ($F9, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X SBC $aa,X ($F5, 2) ; Indexed Indirect SBC ($aa,X) ($E1, 2) ; Indirect Indexed SBC ($aa),Y ($F1, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Overflow, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: increment_and_decrement_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Increment and Decrement Group' (section title for INC, INX, INY, DEC, DEX, DEY).

splits.name: inc_instruction
splits.description: INC (Increment a memory location). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute INC $aaaa ($EE, 3 bytes) affects N,Z ; Zero Page INC $aa ($E6, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X INC $aaaa,X ($FE, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X INC $aa,X ($F6, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: inx_instruction
splits.description: INX (Increment the X register). Implied addressing, opcode $E8, 1 byte. Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: iny_instruction
splits.description: INY (Increment the Y register). Implied addressing, opcode $C8, 1 byte. Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: dec_instruction
splits.description: DEC (Decrement a memory location). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute DEC $aaaa ($CE, 3 bytes) affects N,Z ; Zero Page DEC $aa ($C6, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X DEC $aaaa,X ($DE, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X DEC $aa,X ($D6, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: dex_instruction
splits.description: DEX (Decrement the X register). Implied addressing, opcode $CA, 1 byte. Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: dey_instruction
splits.description: DEY (Decrement the Y register). Implied addressing, opcode $88, 1 byte. Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: register_transfer_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Register Transfer Group' (TAX,TAY,TXA,TYA).

splits.name: register_transfer_instructions
splits.description: Register transfer instructions: TAX (Transfer A to X) opcode $AA, 1 byte, affects N,Z ; TAY (Transfer A to Y) opcode $A8, 1 byte, affects N,Z ; TXA (Transfer X to A) opcode $8A, 1 byte, affects N,Z ; TYA (Transfer Y to A) opcode $98, 1 byte, affects N,Z.

splits.name: logical_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Logical Group' (AND, EOR, ORA).

splits.name: and_instruction
splits.description: AND (Logical AND). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute AND $aaaa ($2D, 3 bytes) affects N,Z ; Zero Page AND $aa ($25, 2) ; Immediate AND #$aa ($29, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X AND $aaaa,X ($3D, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y AND $aaaa,Y ($39, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X AND $aa,X ($35, 2) ; Indexed Indirect AND ($aa,X) ($21, 2) ; Indirect Indexed AND ($aa),Y ($31, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: eor_instruction
splits.description: EOR (Exclusive OR). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute EOR $aaaa ($4D, 3 bytes) affects N,Z ; Zero Page EOR $aa ($45, 2) ; Immediate EOR #$aa ($49, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X EOR $aaaa,X ($5D, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y EOR $aaaa,Y ($59, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X EOR $aa,X ($55, 2) ; Indexed Indirect EOR ($aa,X) ($41, 2) ; Indirect Indexed EOR ($aa),Y ($51, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: ora_instruction
splits.description: ORA (Logical Inclusive OR). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute ORA $aaaa ($0D, 3 bytes) affects N,Z ; Zero Page ORA $aa ($05, 2) ; Immediate ORA #$aa ($09, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X ORA $aaaa,X ($1D, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y ORA $aaaa,Y ($19, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X ORA $aa,X ($15, 2) ; Indexed Indirect ORA ($aa,X) ($01, 2) ; Indirect Indexed ORA ($aa),Y ($11, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero.

splits.name: compare_and_bit_test_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Compare and Bit Test Group' (CMP, CPX, CPY, BIT).

splits.name: cmp_instruction
splits.description: CMP (Compare accumulator). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute CMP $aaaa ($CD, 3 bytes) affects N,Z,C ; Zero Page CMP $aa ($C5, 2) ; Immediate CMP #$aa ($C9, 2) ; Absolute Indexed X CMP $aaaa,X ($DD, 3) ; Absolute Indexed Y CMP $aaaa,Y ($D9, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X CMP $aa,X ($D5, 2) ; Indexed Indirect CMP ($aa,X) ($C1, 2) ; Indirect Indexed CMP ($aa),Y ($D1, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: cpx_instruction
splits.description: CPX (Compare X register). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute CPX $aaaa ($EC, 3 bytes) affects N,Z,C ; Zero Page CPX $aa ($E4, 2) ; Immediate CPX #$aa ($E0, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: cpy_instruction
splits.description: CPY (Compare Y register). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute CPY $aaaa ($CC, 3 bytes) affects N,Z,C ; Zero Page CPY $aa ($C4, 2) ; Immediate CPY #$aa ($C0, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: bit_instruction
splits.description: BIT (Bit Test). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute BIT $aaaa ($2C, 3 bytes) affects N,V,Z ; Zero Page BIT $aa ($24, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Overflow, Zero.

splits.name: shift_and_rotate_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Shift and Rotate Group' (ASL, LSR, ROL, ROR).

splits.name: asl_instruction
splits.description: ASL (Arithmetic Shift Left). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute ASL $aaaa ($0E, 3 bytes) affects N,Z,C ; Zero Page ASL $aa ($06, 2) ; Accumulator ASL A ($0A, 1) ; Absolute Indexed X ASL $aaaa,X ($1E, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X ASL $aa,X ($16, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: lsr_instruction
splits.description: LSR (Logical Shift Right). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute LSR $aaaa ($4E, 3 bytes) affects N,Z,C ; Zero Page LSR $aa ($46, 2) ; Accumulator LSR A ($4A, 1) ; Absolute Indexed X LSR $aaaa,X ($5E, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X LSR $aa,X ($56, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: rol_instruction
splits.description: ROL (Rotate Left). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute ROL $aaaa ($2E, 3 bytes) affects N,Z,C ; Zero Page ROL $aa ($26, 2) ; Accumulator ROL A ($2A, 1) ; Absolute Indexed X ROL $aaaa,X ($3E, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X ROL $aa,X ($36, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: ror_instruction
splits.description: ROR (Rotate Right). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute ROR $aaaa ($6E, 3 bytes) affects N,Z,C ; Zero Page ROR $aa ($66, 2) ; Accumulator ROR A ($6A, 1) ; Absolute Indexed X ROR $aaaa,X ($7E, 3) ; Zero Page Indexed X ROR $aa,X ($76, 2). Flags affected: Negative, Zero, Carry.

splits.name: jump_and_branch_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Jump and Branch Group' (JMP and conditional branches).

splits.name: jmp_instruction
splits.description: JMP (Jump to another location). Addressing modes and opcodes: Absolute JMP $aaaa ($4C, 3 bytes) (no flags affected) ; Indirect JMP ($aaaa) ($6C, 3).

splits.name: branch_instructions
splits.description: Conditional branch opcodes (Relative addressing, 2 bytes each, no flags changed by executing the branch itself): BCC (Branch if carry clear) $90 ; BCS (Branch if carry set) $B0 ; BEQ (Branch if zero set) $F0 ; BMI (Branch if negative set) $30 ; BNE (Branch if zero clear) $D0 ; BPL (Branch if negative clear) $10 ; BVC (Branch if overflow clear) $50 ; BVS (Branch if overflow set) $70.

splits.name: stack_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Stack Group' (TSX, TXS, PHA, PHP, PLA, PLP).

splits.name: stack_instructions
splits.description: Stack-related instructions: TSX (Transfer stack pointer to X) opcode $BA, 1 byte, affects N,Z ; TXS (Transfer X to stack pointer) opcode $9A, 1 byte ; PHA (Push accumulator on stack) opcode $48, 1 byte ; PHP (Push processor status on stack) opcode $08, 1 byte ; PLA (Pull accumulator from stack) opcode $68, 1 byte, affects N,Z ; PLP (Pull processor status from stack) opcode $28, 1 byte, affects all flags as loaded.

splits.name: status_flag_change_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Status Flag Change Group' (CLC, CLD, CLI, CLV, SEC, SED, SEI).

splits.name: status_flag_instructions
splits.description: Status flag change instructions (implied addressing, 1 byte each): CLC (Clear carry) $18 affects C ; CLD (Clear decimal) $D8 affects D ; CLI (Clear interrupt disable) $58 affects I ; CLV (Clear overflow) $B8 affects V ; SEC (Set carry) $38 affects C ; SED (Set decimal) $F8 affects D ; SEI (Set interrupt disable) $78 affects I.

references.topic: SEI/CLI can affect interrupt-driven branching and IRQ behavior

splits.name: subroutine_and_interrupt_group_header
splits.description: Group header: 'Subroutine and Interrupt Group' (JSR, RTS, BRK, RTI, NOP).

references.topic: stack operations used by subroutines and interrupts

splits.name: subroutine_interrupt_instructions
splits.description: Subroutine and interrupt instructions: JSR (Jump to subroutine) Absolute JSR $aaaa ($20, 3 bytes) ; RTS (Return from subroutine) opcode $60, 1 byte ; BRK (Force an interrupt) opcode $00, 1 byte, sets B and I flags ; RTI (Return from Interrupt) opcode $40, 1 byte, restores all flags ; NOP (No Operation) opcode $EA, 1 byte. Note: stack operations (PHA/PLA/PHP/PLP) are used with interrupts/subroutines.

references.topic: BRK/RTI interact with processor status flags
